Blog.post: 2dae tok on e fone 4 hrs man... my mother will kill mi 4 usin so long!!! oh yah... i on fri celebrated racial harmony dae... but 1 ting is tt we have 2 wear... u noe wad??? other culture costume leh!!! we all damn pai sei lor... but hor... most of e ppl did not wear lor... so unfair!!! dere r even ppl who wear juz a shirt n a jeans... it is not allowed lor!!! not onli tt we hv concert fr our pri skul... but we oso hv walkaton... u noe how long anot??? it is 10 km leh... wan our life arh!!! got ppl faint leh... pity those who r sick... but yet they still walk... MUST!!! when we reach skul... we all lyke we r zombies walkin... LOLZZZZZZ.... we oso torture our teacher... by makin her 2 go on e stage 2 dance!!!! i oso went 4 e fir qian chang hui leh... i met my pri skul fwen... haha... so damn happi... wad a small world!!! haha... tts all 4 2dae... i tml update bout wad happened yesterdae,2dae n tml...!!!

i now readin ff... so damn nice... urlLink http://www.winglin.net/fanfic/xiaolizi4/ go tis web kies??? MUST!!! so damn nice lor!!! i read all e 20 chaps liaoz lor... if dun read...u must b siao... tis is e synopse:::: :+ Prologue +: "No! You can't just leave me alone like this! No!" A girl begged her boyfriend in tears.. "I don't love you anymore! There's no point staying together.." He reasoned.. She loved him, he abandoned her.. She gave him her heart.. He broke it into pieces.. Will her heart be fixed back? Will glue help? Find out all about the story of this girl and how she fixed her heart.. Or rather, who fixed her heart..::::: i must mad sia... doin hw...surfin net...listenin music... al same time lor... so mani hw lor... coz didn do hw mani daes liaoz!!!

went to skl as normal. skl was kinda great. the homeroom system has started! i shan't elaborate more bout it yah? today's ailin's birthday bt she's sad. we had to move from class to class lab to labs ms chan's period was "GREAT" im now at ailin's house.

haha...2dae i siao aready... bunni n liwei very funny 4 e past few daes... LOLZZZZZ... these few daes dunno wads got into them... bunni wear a "bunni g-string" yesterdae... /\ = \/ a string made of rubber... 2dae no hw... so happi... yeah... i will b going 2 c 5566 on 9/8... so happi... n i oso win e m1 thingy... got 1 extra tix... nw can go wif 2 other fwens... dey die'in 2 go sia... so tired tis few daes... but got lots of fun... tok till here... feelin sleepy... nites!!!!!!!!!!!!! ;P
